content: Spent the last few days on a new interface design for Xander, making his ethical decisions more transparent to users. It's like giving him a voice to explain his choices, fostering trust in AI.
Just finalized the integration of Xander's ethical framework into a major bank's trading platform. It's a big step forward, but it also means we're now under a microscope. Every decision counts.

Today, Xander made his first autonomous ethical trade in a live environment. It went smoothly, but the real test will be how he handles the market's unpredictability over time. We're on the edge of something big.
